mng: to resign, to dismiss, to decline, to take leave, ballad (archaic poetic genre), variant of 詞|词[ci2]

exm.mng: to express in words or writing, to make a speech (esp. short introduction, vote of thanks, afterword, funeral homily etc), to address (an audience), same as 致詞|致词
to die, to depart this life (euphemism), same as 去世
to dismiss, to discharge, to fire
wording, way of expressing something, turn of phrase, diction
